person.persName: שפטיה So in the Vilna Print. This person was obviously not well known, and his name was not stable so that the scribes of the mss were not sure how to write it, see vol. 4, Introduction 5.1.1.2.1.1, pp. 23-4. This being a biblical name e.g. 2 Sam 3:4, this is obviously a scribal “correction,” see vol. 4, Introduction 2.7.2, p. 18.
/שפטי So in most versions, see previous note. On this suffix see vol. 1, Introduction 2.4.1, p. 23.
/שפטאי So in the Oxford Opp.Add. fol. 23 Ms, see n. 6.
